sentences.en: "Nine," said I. "Nine thirty," tried he. We compromised on 9.15.
sentences.cn: “9点。”我说。“9点半。”他试着说。于是我们各让一步，定在了9点一刻。

sentences.en: He counted to thirty for her in Spanish and then told her he could count to one million in English.
sentences.cn: 我儿子为她表演了用西班牙语查数，一直到三十，然后告诉她，他可以用英语一直查到一百万。

sentences.en: Her Irish accent, after thirty-odd years in London, is undiluted.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦呆了30多年，爱尔兰口音仍很浓重。

sentences.en: Hilton roused him at eight-thirty by rapping on the door.
sentences.cn: 希尔顿8点半敲门把他叫醒了。

sentences.en: His words refreshed my memory that he remained a bachelor at the age of thirty.
sentences.cn: 他的话使我回想起他三十岁时还是个光棍。

sentences.en: I know that you'vebeen studying chimpanzees for thirty years now.
sentences.cn: 我知道你研究黑猩猩至今已有30年了。

sentences.en: I've got two Malaysians coming to see me at eleven thirty.
sentences.cn: 11点半会有两名马来西亚人来看我。

sentences.en: In the thirties, air travel really began to take off.
sentences.cn: 在30年代，乘飞机旅行迅速流行了起来。

sentences.en: It took thirty-five seconds for the hour to strike.
Motorists will be rationed to thirty litres of petrol a month.
sentences.cn: 汽车司机每月的油量将限定为30升。

sentences.en: She was about thirty, ten years older than the youngsters ragging her.
sentences.cn: 她大概有30岁，比那些嘲弄她的年轻人大10岁。

sentences.en: That night the mercury fell to thirty degrees below zero.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上温度计显示气温降到了零下30度。

sentences.en: The association between the two companies stretches back thirty years.
sentences.cn: 这两家公司的往来可以追溯到30年前。

sentences.en: The driver was a trim young woman of perhaps thirty.
sentences.cn: 司机是个大约30岁的身材苗条的年轻女子。

sentences.en: The price of a single ticket is thirty-nine pounds.
There were thirty students present,reckoning without the girlstudents.
sentences.cn: 不算女生，有三十个学生出席。

sentences.en: They walked through the dense Mozambican bush for thirty six hours.
sentences.cn: 他们花了36个小时穿过茂密的莫桑比克丛林。

sentences.en: Thirty seconds later she reappeared and beckoned them forward.
sentences.cn: 30秒后她又出现了，示意他们往前来。

sentences.en: Yesterday no fewer than thirty climbers reached the summit.
sentences.cn: 昨天至少30名攀登者登上了顶峰。

words.tran_cn: 第三十个的；三十分之一的

trans.tran_cn: 三十，三十个，三十年代，三十的记号
